column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////This location in midtown is perfect. It's drivable from downtown and open until 2 AM on weekends to serve the late night crowd. There's street or free garage parking nearby. I'm so glad Jinya took over what was formerly Sushi Raku
column2: which was the worst joint I've ever been to. They served me a shrimp tempura roll in which two pieces had NO SHRIMP. Just rice.
